H0.text: Which 1983 film starring Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger won 5 Oscars (Academy Awards). Terms of Endearment

H1.text: Which 1983 film starring Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger won 5 Oscars (Academy Awards). Yentl

H2.text: Which 1983 film starring Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger won 5 Oscars (Academy Awards). Silkwood

H3.text: Which 1983 film starring Shirley MacLaine and Debra Winger won 5 Oscars (Academy Awards). Aurora Greenway

A4.text: At the 56th Academy Awards, the film received a leading 11 nominations, and won a leading five awards: Best Picture, Best Director, Best Actress (MacLaine), Best Adapted Screenplay, and Best Supporting Actor (Nicholson).

A5.text: Gene Siskel correctly predicted upon its release that it would go on to win the Academy Award for Best Picture of 1983.
